title: There is a black spot on the top right hand corner of my screen. Is this a hardware problem?
content:
It was after an update that I noticed the black spot on the top right hand corner of my screen. 

I've restarted the phone, turned off developer settings but the problem still persist. 

If this is a hardware problem, and I am sure that my phone is still under the first year warranty, how can I get it replaced?
